name: Transports Of Night City
desc: Want to get a ride in Night City ? Without driving ? Or go to a place quickly ? Call Delamain Service and you will be always right in time !
author: RedRockStudio (donk7413)

changelog.desc:
1.0.3 
 -Added an option for call delamain Support (when car is bugged)

extranote: Enable the datapack and call 'CS : Delamain Service' in your contact list.
